title: Overview
description: I am a project manager and technical leader with solid experience in developing enterprise software solutions. I design and implement cloud-based, mobile, advanced CRM, e-commerce systems and business management platforms, combining a clear architectural vision with a full-stack operational approach. I actively support the team in defining the architectural design and distributing tasks, promoting a shared, clear and sustainable development process. I have gained experience in coordinating work groups, encouraging collaboration and the adoption of good technical practices. With a solid and result-oriented technical approach, I transform complex requirements into effective digital solutions, selecting appropriate technologies for building integrated systems that enable innovation and foster project growth.
